findings.title: Elevated Impact to Smart Contract's Safety and Security
findings.description: Active smart contract owner can blacklist certain wallets from interacting with the contract.

findings.title: Elevated Impact to Smart Contract's Safety and Security
findings.description: Active smart contract owner privileges constitute an elevated impact to smart contract's safety and security.

findings.title: Imposing Extraordinary Transaction Fees
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change the buy and sell fees, with no threshold on max fees.

findings.title: Thresholdless Maximum Transaction Value
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change the max transaction %, with no threshold on max tx value.
